Detailed Description

Represents a push-button widget.

Push-buttons can be pressed, or clicked, by the user to perform an action.

The following example demonstrates how to use the Button

 gaia::ui::Button* mpButton = new gaia::ui::Button(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // set button text
 mpButton->setText("Hello, World!");
